clintock:BiomoleculePool.NAME: Biomolecule Pool
clintock:BiomoleculePool.FLAVOR: "[Pure research] is worth every penny it costs." NL #yHarold #yUrey
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, gain 3 #ySugars and 3 #yPhosphates.

clintock:MG53.NAME: MG53
clintock:MG53.FLAVOR: "I was taught that the way of progress was neither swift nor easy." NL #yMarie #yCurie
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of battle, heal 1 HP for each #yAmino acid in your #yPolypeptide chain.

clintock:NTerminusArginine.NAME: N-terminus Arginine
clintock:NTerminusArginine.FLAVOR: "If you know you are on the right track, if you have this inner knowledge, then nobody can turn you off... no matter what they say." NL #yBarbara #yMcClintock
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, #yBind #yArginine to your #yPolypeptide chain.
